blogPost.excerpt: Check is a payroll-as-a-service API that lets you embed payroll directly in your product. We provide all the building blocks for full-featured payroll, including a powerful API, modular white-label onboarding components, and a partner dashboard.
blogPost.body: Check is a payroll-as-a-service API that lets you embed payroll directly in your product. We provide all the building blocks for full-featured payroll, including a powerful API, modular white-label onboarding components, and a partner dashboard.
blogPost.title: Check - Embed payroll in your product
blogPost.author: Nathan Baschez

localize.description: Check是一个薪资即服务的API，让您可以将薪资直接嵌入到您的产品中。我们为全功能的工资单提供了所有的构建模块，包括一个强大的API、模块化的白标上岗组件和一个合作伙伴仪表板。
localize.tagline: 在您的产品中嵌入工资单

localize.description: Check是一個薪資即服務的API，讓您可以將薪資直接嵌入到您的產品中。我們爲全功能的工資單提供了所有的構建模塊，包括一個強大的API、模塊化的白標上崗組件和一個合作伙伴儀表板。
localize.tagline: 在您的產品中嵌入工資單

next.title: 30-Year Mortgage Rate in the US moves back above 3% for the first time since last July, up 37 bps from its all-time low of 2.65% in early January. https://t.co/aRDxuydtB4

localize.full_text: 美国30年期抵押贷款利率自去年7月以来首次回升至3%以上，较1月初的历史低点2.65%上升37个基点。https://t.co/aRDxuydtB4。
美國30年期抵押貸款利率自去年7月以來首次回升至3%以上，較1月初的歷史低點2.65%上升37個基點。https://t.co/aRDxuydtB4。
